resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/115874076</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>115874076</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660d-b8b4-4245-2794-2d2934a60ce5#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Növényi motívumok, madarak, Santa Pudenziana szentélykörüljárójának boltozata, 5. század, Róma, mozaik.</string>
            <string language="en">Floral motives, birds, the vault of encircling aisle of the Santa Pudenziana, 5th century, Rome, mosaic.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blumenmotive, Vögel, die Wölbung des Umkreisens
des Ganges der Sankt Pudenziana, 5. Jahrhundert, Rom, Mosaik.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Motifs floraux, oiseaux, la chambre forte 
d'encercler le bas-côté de la Santa Pudenziana, 5ème siècle, Rome,
mosaïque.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Motriz floral, pássaros, o vault de encircling o
corredor da Santa Pudenziana, ö século, Roma, mosaic.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Motivi floreali, uccelli, la volta di circondare 
navata della Santa Pudenziana, quinto secolo, Roma, mosaico.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Floral κίνητρα, πουλιά, ο υπόγειος θάλαμος της 
περικύκλωσης του διαδρόμου του Santa Pudenziana, 5$ος αιώνας,
Ρώμη, μωσαϊκό.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Motivos florales, pájaros, la cámara acorazada 
de cercar el pasillo del Santa Pudenziana, 5to siglo, Roma, mosaico.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A Santa Pudenziana szentélykörüljárójának boltozatán megjelennek az ókeresztény kor ornamentikájának motívumai: szőlőt csipegető galambok, páva, szőlő.</string>
            <string language="en">On the vault of encircling aisle of the Santa Pudenziana appear the motives of ornamentation of the paleochristian era: pigeons pecking about grape, peafowl, grape</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Santa Pudenziana,  ókeresztény kor,  szőlő,  páva,  galamb,  mozaik,  </string>
            <string language="en">Santa Pudenziana, paleochristian era, grape, peafowl, pigeon, mosaic</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auf der Wölbung des Umkreisens des Ganges der Sankt 
erscheinen Pudenziana die Motive der Verzierung der paleochristian 
Ära: Tauben, die über Traube, Peafowl, Traube pecking sind</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sur la chambre forte d'encercler le bas-côté de la Santa
Pudenziana apparaissent les motifs de l'ornement de l'ère 
paleochristian : pigeons picotant au sujet du raisin, peafowl, 
raisin</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">No vault de encircling o corredor da Santa Pudenziana 
aparece os motriz do ornamentation da era paleochristian: pombos
que pecking sobre a uva, peafowl, uva</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sulla volta di circondare la navata della Santa Pudenziana
compare i motivi di ornamentation dell'era paleochristian: 
piccioni che pecking circa l'uva, peafowl, uva</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στον υπόγειο θάλαμο της περικύκλωσης του διαδρόμου του
Santa Pudenziana εμφανίζεται τα κίνητρα της διακόσμησης της 
paleochristian εποχής: περιστέρια που ραμφίζουν για το 
σταφύλι, peafowl, σταφύλι</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En la cámara acorazada de cercar el pasillo del Santa 
Pudenziana aparece los motivos del ornamentation de la era 
paleochristian: palomas que picotean sobre la uva, peafowl, uva</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sankt Pudenziana, paleochristian Ära, Traube, Peafowl,
Taube, Mosaik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Santa Pudenziana, ère paleochristian, raisin, peafowl,
pigeon, mosaïque</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Santa Pudenziana, era paleochristian, uva, peafowl, 
pombo, mosaic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Santa Pudenziana, era paleochristian, uva, peafowl, 
piccione, mosaico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Santa Pudenziana, paleochristian εποχή, σταφύλι, 
peafowl, περιστέρι, μωσαϊκό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Santa Pudenziana, era paleochristian, uva, peafowl, 
paloma, mosaico</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>

            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

            <value>discipline</value>

        <metaMetadata>

              <value>provider</value>

        org:Sulinet

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
